subject: Self Care
title: Boredom as a Superpower
description: Learn Boredom as a Superpower in one minute.

hook.text: Every moment of boredom is instantly filled with a phone check. We've lost the ability to sit with nothing.

buildup.text: Boredom activates the default mode network â€” the brain state where creativity, planning, and insight emerge.

discovery.text: Research shows that people who tolerate boredom generate more creative solutions than those who constantly stimulate themselves.

twist.text: By filling every bored moment with a phone, you're not resting. You're stealing your own creative processing time.

climax.text: Practice doing nothing for five minutes daily. No phone, no book, no music. Let the mind wander. Ideas will arrive.

punchline.text: Boredom breeds creativity. Stop filling every quiet moment.

quiz.question: What brain network does boredom activate?
options: The default mode network linked to creativity and insight
